title: Loading screen keeps crashing
body:
I have this problem since yesterday. Whenever I am starting a game, in loading screen it says: You have disconnected, please check your internet connection and try again.

But my internet is fine. I have to wait untill everyone is in the game and then I can reload. I have to close LOL and login again like 3 times. Didnt have this problem before yesterday. I tried to reinstall the game but it doenst work.

Does anyone know what to do about this?

xx Lotte

I used HRT. This is the Network log:

replies.body:
It's not uncommon for people to be able to pull up a website like youtube but not be able to pull up other websites or connect to services like League. This happens simply because each website or game is hosted on a different server, so it doesn't mean your internet is failing it just means it's having a hard time reaching that specific servers, often due to how your connection is being routed. 

Do me a favor and update a couple network settings before we dive too deep in troubleshooting this. Check out our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for the steps on port forwarding and how to setup your DNS server settings. Test those changes in a custom game and let me know if they help or not.

I'm not sure how to check because I am not an expert with computers. But I've made some screenshots. 

https://prnt.sc/hd97gj
https://prnt.sc/hd97o3

I am not sure what this means.
